abstract: Senate votes, 78-21, to approve amendment to defense authorization bill that would restrict all government entities, not just military, to using only interrogation techniques described in Army Field Manual.
lead_paragraph: A 2005 law prohibited the Pentagon from using harsh interrogation methods, but did not apply to the C.I.A. and other agencies.

headline.main: Senate Votes to Turn Presidential Ban on Torture Into Law
headline.print_headline: Senate Votes to Turn Presidential Ban on Torture Into Law

snippet: A 2005 law prohibited the Pentagon from using harsh interrogation methods, but did not apply to the C.I.A. and other agencies.
